original_text: When I was going to Macedonia, I asked you to stay in Ephesus. Please continue to stay there. Certain people in Ephesus are teaching wrong things about God. You must tell them to stop doing that.
korean_text: 내가 마게도냐로 갈 때에 너를 권하여 에베소에 머물라 한 것은 어떤 사람들을 명하여 다른 교훈을 가르치지 말며

sentences.original_text: When I was going to Macedonia
I asked you to stay in Ephesus
are teaching wrong things about God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님에 대해 잘못된 것들을 가르치고 있다

sentences.original_text: You must tell them to stop doing that
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들에게 그것을 그만두라고 말해야 한다
